11.sl_source: V velikem mestu počne velike stvari.
11.eng_source: He's in the big town doing things in a big way.
11.sl_trans: Je v velikem mestu in dela stvari na velik način.

13.eng_source: Just a couple of nobodies, nothing.

14.eng_source: Is that what you want, Rico?

15.eng_source: A party like that for you?

16.sl_source:
Caesar Enrico Bandello.
Kolegi so mu izkazali čast.
16.eng_source:
Caesar Enrico Bandello.
Honored by his friends.
16.sl_trans:
Cezar Enrico Bandello.
Njegovi prijatelji so mu izkazali čast.

17.sl_source: Lahko bi počel vse, kar počne on, in še več.
17.eng_source: I could do all the things that fella does and more.
17.sl_trans: Lahko bi počel vse, kar počne ta fant, in še več.

18.eng_source: Only I never got my chance.
18.sl_trans: Le da nikoli nisem dobil priložnosti.

19.eng_source: And what's there to be afraid of?
19.sl_trans: In česa se je treba bati?

20.sl_source: Ko se znajdem v zagati, začnem streljati, pa je.
20.eng_source: When I get in a tight spot, I shoot my way out of it.
20.sl_trans: Ko se znajdem v težavah, se iz njih rešim s streljanjem.

21.sl_trans: Najprej streljajte, nato pa se pogovarjajte.

22.eng_source: You know, this game ain't for guys that's soft.
22.sl_trans: Veste, ta igra ni za mehke fante.

23.sl_source: Ja, v velikem mestu je veliko denarja.
23.eng_source: Yeah, there's money in the big town, all right.
23.sl_trans: Ja, v velikem mestu je denar, prav je tako.

25.sl_source: Zabavno je, ves čas se kaj dogaja.
25.eng_source: Good times, something doing all the time.
25.sl_trans: Dobri časi, ves čas nekaj delaš.

29.sl_source: Spet bi plesal, kot sem, preden sem te spoznal.
29.eng_source: I'd go back to dancing, like I used to before I met you.
29.sl_trans: Vrnila bi se k plesu, kot sem ga plesala, preden sem te spoznala.

30.sl_source: Kaj pa vem, nisem za te reči.
30.eng_source: I don't know, I ain't made for this sort of thing.
30.sl_trans: Ne vem, nisem ustvarjen za takšne stvari.

35.eng_source: And where do they get you?

37.sl_source: Drugi bodo plesali, kot bom jaz igral.
37.eng_source: I'm figuring on making other people dance.
37.sl_trans: Mislim, da bodo drugi ljudje plesali.

38.eng_source: - Oh, I ain't forgetting about the money.

39.sl_source: -Denar je v redu, ni pa vse.
39.eng_source: - Money's okay, but it ain't everything.
39.sl_trans: - Denar je v redu, vendar ni vse.

40.sl_source: Biti hočem pomemben, da bom ukazoval ljudem.
40.eng_source: Be somebody, look hard at a bunch of guys and know they'll do anything you tell them.
40.sl_trans: Bodi nekdo, poglej na skupino fantov in vedi, da bodo naredili vse, kar jim boš rekel.

41.sl_source: Da bo po moje ali pa nič.
41.eng_source: Have your own way or nothing.

46.sl_source: -Veš, to je bil najin zadnji posel v tem kraju.
46.eng_source: - You know this was our last stand in this burg.
46.sl_trans: - Veš, da je bil to naš zadnji obstanek v tem mestu.

51.sl_source: ln sem šel na vzhod, kot sem že rekel.
51.eng_source: So I beat it east, like I told you.
51.sl_trans: Zato sem ga premagal na vzhodu, kot sem vam že povedal.

52.eng_source: That's all there is to it.
52.sl_trans: To je vse, kar je treba storiti.

53.sl_source: Pridružil bi se vaši tolpi, če dovolite.
53.eng_source: I wanna run with your mob, if you'll let me.
53.sl_trans: Če mi dovolite, želim teči z vašo tolpo.

55.eng_source: You won't be sorry for letting me in.
55.sl_trans: Ne bo vam žal, da ste mi dovolili vstopiti.

56.sl_trans: Naredil bom vse, kar boste rekli.

58.eng_source: You think you're a hard guy?

62.eng_source: - You got an idea you're good, huh?

63.eng_source: Give me a chance to show you.
63.sl_trans: Dajte mi priložnost, da vam pokažem.

64.eng_source: - What do you know about me?

66.sl_source: Kako vodite zadeve v tem delu.
66.eng_source: How you run things this end of town.
66.sl_trans: Kako vodite zadeve v tem koncu mesta.

67.sl_source: Pa o tem klubu Palermo, da je vaša krinka.
67.eng_source: About this here Club Palermo, how it's your front.
67.sl_trans: O tem klubu Palermo, kako je vaš prednji del.

69.sl_source: Najbrž si spreten tudi z orožjem?
69.eng_source: - I guess you're good with a rod too, huh?
69.sl_trans: - Mislim, da si dober tudi s palico, kajne?

71.sl_source: No, tukaj se tega ne gremo več.
71.eng_source: Well, that don't go around here.
71.sl_trans: No, to se ne dogaja tukaj.

75.sl_source: Vendar ne pozabi, da sem jaz šef.
75.sl_trans: Vendar ne pozabite, da sem jaz šef.

76.eng_source: And I give all the orders.

77.sl_source: ln plen si delimo tako, kot rečem jaz.
77.eng_source: And when we split, we split my way.
77.sl_trans: In ko smo se razdelili, smo se razdelili po mojem.

81.sl_source: Zdaj pa se spoznaj s fanti.
81.eng_source: - All right, come on in, meet the boys.

86.eng_source: Can drive a car better than any mug in the town.
86.sl_trans: Zna voziti avto bolje kot katerikoli moški v mestu.

87.sl_source: Je majhen, a zato nič slabši.
87.eng_source: He's little, but he's the goods, all right.
87.sl_trans: Majhen je, a je dober, jasno.

89.eng_source: What a smart guy he is.

93.eng_source: I want you to meet a new guy what's gonna be with us.
93.sl_trans: Želim, da spoznaš novega fanta, ki bo z nami.

96.sl_source: Kje si dobil novega plesalca, De Voss?
96.eng_source: Where did you get the new dancer, DeVoss?
96.sl_trans: Kje ste dobili novega plesalca, DeVoss?

97.sl_source: Olga ga je pripeljala pred par dnevi.
97.eng_source: Olga brought him around a few days ago.
97.sl_trans: Olga ga je pred nekaj dnevi pripeljala naokoli.

101.sl_source: Sem našla pravega plesalca za partnerja, kajne?
101.eng_source: Well, I got hold of a real dancer for a partner, didn't I, Mr. Devoss?
101.sl_trans: Za partnerja sem dobil pravega plesalca, kajne, gospod Devoss?

103.eng_source: We'll panic them after a few rehearsals.
103.sl_trans: Po nekaj vajah jih bomo preverili v paniki.

104.sl_source: Menda mi ga ne skušaš prodati, Olga?
104.eng_source: Say, you're not trying to sell him to me, are you, Olga?
104.sl_trans: Recimo, da mi ga ne poskušaš prodati, kajne, Olga?

105.sl_source: No, mladenič, za 100 na teden te najbrž dobim.
105.eng_source: Well, young fella, I guess 100 a week ought to buy you.
105.sl_trans: No, mladenič, mislim, da ti bo 100 evrov na teden zadostovalo.

106.eng_source: That's more than I generally start with.
106.sl_trans: To je več, kot imam običajno na začetku.

107.sl_source: Meni je super, čeprav ne kupujem limuzin.
107.eng_source: That's swell with me, even though it don't buy no limousines.
107.sl_trans: To mi ustreza, čeprav ne kupujem limuzin.

109.eng_source: You'll never be sorry for this.
109.sl_trans: Za to vam ne bo nikoli žal.

111.eng_source: So it's you and me from now on.
111.sl_trans: Od zdaj naprej sva torej samo midva.

113.sl_source: ln ni mi nerodno to povedati.
113.eng_source: And I'm not ashamed to tell you.

114.sl_source: Zdaj najbrž že veš, kaj čutim do tebe.
114.eng_source: I guess you know by this time how I feel about you.
114.sl_trans: Mislim, da že veš, kaj čutim do tebe.

115.eng_source: That's all right with you, isn't it?

121.sl_trans: - Poskrbeli bomo, da bo nekaj pomenila.

130.eng_source: What are you doing with that?

131.sl_source: Ne bi pozabila, kaj si videla?
131.eng_source: Can't you forget you've seen it?
131.sl_trans: Ali ne morete pozabiti, da ste ga videli?

135.sl_source: To je samo amulet, ki ga nosim s sabo.
135.eng_source: It's just a little good-luck charm I carry around with me.
135.sl_trans: To je le majhen talisman za srečo, ki ga nosim s seboj.

138.eng_source: I suppose I got no right to ask you, Joe.
138.sl_trans: Mislim, da nimam pravice vprašati tebe, Joe.

139.eng_source: Now that we got an understanding.

141.eng_source: I suppose I haven't got the right.

142.sl_source: Kaj bi koristilo, če bi me prosila?
142.eng_source: What would be the good of you asking, kid?
142.sl_trans: Kaj bi bilo dobro, če bi vprašal, fant?

146.eng_source: Maybe it could be different this time.

148.sl_source: Ne poznam nikogar, ki bi se izvlekel iz tega.
148.eng_source: I've never seen the guy that could get away with it yet.
148.sl_trans: Nikoli še nisem videl človeka, ki bi mu to uspelo.

152.eng_source: All right, I guess I'll have to see him.
152.sl_trans: Dobro, mislim, da ga bom moral obiskati.

153.eng_source: I wonder what he wants here.

155.sl_source: Ostani z mano, potreboval te bom.
155.eng_source: You'd better stick with me, I'll need you in there.
155.sl_trans: Raje se držite z mano, saj vas bom tam potreboval.

156.eng_source: - That Sam Vettori's a no-good lug.
156.sl_trans: - Ta Sam Vettori je nič hudega sluteč.

158.sl_trans: Raje me pustite, da grem prvi.

161.sl_source: Si presenečen, da me vidiš v svojem nobel lokalu?
161.eng_source: Surprised to see me in your swell joint?
161.sl_trans: Si presenečen, da me vidiš v svojem razkošnem lokalu?

162.sl_source: Morda ne bom, ko poveš, po kaj si prišel.
162.eng_source: Maybe I won't be after you tell me what you want here.
162.sl_trans: Morda ne bom, ko mi boš povedal, kaj hočeš tukaj.

163.eng_source: Oh, I'll tell you, all right.

164.sl_source: Diamond Pete me je prosil, naj pridem.
164.eng_source: Diamond Pete asked me to come up.
164.sl_trans: Diamond Pete me je prosil, naj pridem gor.

167.sl_source: če te je poslal Pete, potem me ne sme motiti.
167.eng_source: Well, if Pete wants you here, it's got to be all right with me.
167.sl_trans: No, če te Pete želi tukaj, se mi to zdi v redu.

173.eng_source: I got something to tell you.

174.sl_source: Big Boy ima sporočilo za vas.
174.eng_source: A message from the Big Boy.

178.sl_source: Ti je kdo rekel, da bodi zraven?
178.eng_source: Nobody asked you to be butting in here, did they?
178.sl_trans: Nihče te ni prosil, da se vmešavaš sem, kajne?

183.eng_source: You go out there and wait for me.

186.sl_source: Bodite pozorni na McClura, novega šefa komisije za kriminal.
186.eng_source: Watch this guy McClure what's head of the new crime commission.
186.sl_trans: Oglejte si tega človeka McClure, ki je vodja nove komisije za kriminal.

187.sl_source: Diha nam za ovratnik, zato ne delajte napak.
187.eng_source: He's putting the screws on, and make no mistake about him.

188.sl_source: Big Boy je naročil, naj vam povem, da imejte nekaj mesecev svoje gorile na povodcu.
188.eng_source: Now, the Big Boy wants me to tell you guys to put the chains on your gorillas for the next few months.
188.sl_trans: Veliki deček želi, da vam povem, da za naslednjih nekaj mesecev gorilam nadenete verige.

189.sl_source: Ker če bo šel kdo predalec, bo za vse hudo.
189.eng_source: Because if any of them go too far, it'll be just too bad.
189.sl_trans: Če bo šla katera od njih predaleč, bo preprosto hudo.

190.sl_source: Ni ga, ki mu Big Boy ne bi mogel do živega.
190.eng_source: I've never seen nobody the Big Boy couldn't get to.
190.sl_trans: Še nikoli nisem videl nikogar, do katerega Big Boy ne bi mogel priti.

192.eng_source: That's why he's the Big Boy.

193.sl_source: Tale McClure bo zanj mala malica.
193.eng_source: This bird McClure will be pie for him.
193.sl_trans: Ta ptica McClure bo zanj pita.

194.eng_source: - He'll twist him around his little finger.
194.sl_trans: - Obšel si ga bo okoli malega prsta.

196.sl_trans: Z McClurom se nihče ne spopada.

199.eng_source: We could spring guys for them.
199.sl_trans: Zanje bi lahko pripravili pomladne fante.

202.sl_source: Težave povzročajo tipi, kakršen je ta tvoj torpedo.
202.eng_source: It's guys like this torpedo of yours that cause all the trouble.
202.sl_trans: Težave povzročajo ljudje, kot je ta vaš torpedo.

204.sl_trans: Z njim je vse v redu.

205.sl_source: Res malo prehitro povleče pištolo, a to je zato, ker je še nov.
205.eng_source: He's a little quick on the trigger, but that's because he's new.
205.sl_trans: Nekoliko hitreje sproži sprožilec, vendar je to zato, ker je novinec.

207.sl_source: Mi bomo nasankali, če bo streljal ob nepravem času.
207.eng_source: Well, it's us that'll swing for him if he shoots at the wrong time.
207.sl_trans: Če bo streljal ob nepravem času, bomo to storili mi.

208.sl_source: Ne pozabite, kaj sem vam rekel.
208.eng_source: Now, remember what I told you.
208.sl_trans: Spomnite se, kaj sem vam povedal.

209.sl_source: Ti pa se umiri s tem svojim kanonom.
209.eng_source: You take it easy with that cannon of yours.
209.sl_trans: S tem svojim topom se ne obremenjuj.

212.eng_source: Do yourself a favor, will you, Rico?

213.sl_source: Naslednjič pusti revolver doma na klavirju.
213.eng_source: Leave your gat home on the piano the next job you pull.
213.sl_trans: Pri naslednjem delu pustite svoj gat home na klavirju.

214.eng_source: Yeah, park it next to your milk bottle.
214.sl_trans: Ja, postavite ga poleg steklenice z mlekom.

215.sl_source: Ti vodi svojo tolpo, Arnie, jaz pa bom skrbel za svojo.
215.eng_source: Run your own mob, Arnie, and I'll take care of mine.
215.sl_trans: Vodi svojo mafijo, Arnie, jaz pa bom poskrbel za svojo.

217.sl_source: Ne rabim kanona, da pospravim take, kot ste vi, g. Lorch.
217.eng_source: I don't need no cannon to take care of guys like you, Mr. Lorch.
217.sl_trans: Ne potrebujem nobenega topa, da bi poskrbel za ljudi, kot ste vi, gospod Lorch.

219.sl_source: Little Arnie se zanima za ta nočni klub.
219.eng_source: Little Arnie's interested in this here nightclub.
219.sl_trans: Malega Arnieja zanima ta nočni klub.

220.sl_source: če se izve, kdo je bil...
220.eng_source: - If it ever gets out who pulled the job-
220.sl_trans: - Če se kdaj razkrije, kdo je potegnil delo...

221.eng_source: - They'll never get wise to us.

222.sl_source: So neprevidni, a niso jih še oropali.
222.eng_source: They're careless, but they've never been tapped.
222.sl_trans: So neprevidni, vendar jih še nikoli nihče ni otipaval.

223.sl_source: Ja, a vseeno mi tole ni všeč.
223.eng_source: Yeah, but I don't like the whole business.
223.sl_trans: Ja, vendar mi celoten posel ni všeč.

228.eng_source: I don't want to take any chances.

229.sl_source: Še posebej zdaj, ko nam dihajo za ovratnik.
229.eng_source: Not now the way they're closing down on us.

230.sl_source: Kaj je, se ti tresejo hlače?
230.eng_source: What's the matter, Tony, getting yellow?
230.sl_trans: Kaj se dogaja, Tony, da postajaš rumen?

231.sl_source: Ne, ampak nobeden si ne želi na vislice, ne?
231.eng_source: No, but, jeez, none of us wanna hang, do we?
231.sl_trans: Ne, ampak, jezus, nihče od nas ne želi viseti, kajne?

232.eng_source: You'd like to quit, wouldn't you?

233.eng_source: You'd like to run out on us.

235.eng_source: Where do you get that yellow stuff?

236.sl_source: Te res zanima, komu se stresejo?
236.eng_source: You want to know who's yellow, I'll tell you.
236.sl_trans: Če želite vedeti, kdo je rumeni, vam povem.

237.eng_source: - That's why he didn't show tonight.

239.eng_source: I know all about that stuff.

240.eng_source: I'm gonna give him 10 minutes more.

242.sl_source: Poslušaj, Sam, Joe je v redu.
242.eng_source: Now, listen, Sam, Joe's all right.
242.sl_trans: Poslušaj, Sam, z Joejem je vse v redu.

243.eng_source: He's the best front man in the world.

244.sl_source: Lahko gre v nobel hotel in najame apartma, pa ni sumljivo.
244.eng_source: Why, he can go to a swell hotel and order a suite, a suite, and it's all right.
244.sl_trans: Lahko gre v odličen hotel in naroči apartma, apartma, in vse je v redu.

245.sl_source: Brez njega tega ne moremo izpeljati, to dobro veš.
245.eng_source: Without Joe, we can't pull the job, and you know it.
245.sl_trans: Brez Joea ne moremo opraviti dela in ti to veš.

247.sl_source: Načrt, ki sva ga naredila s Scabbyjem.
247.eng_source: It's this layout I've been figuring out with Scabby.
247.sl_trans: To je tista postavitev, ki sem jo sestavljala s Scabbyjem.

248.sl_source: Za ta posel v nočnem klubu?
248.sl_trans: - Kaj, to delo v nočnem klubu?

250.sl_source: ln dokler ne ukažem drugače, ne bo za to tolpo načrtoval nihče drug razen mene.
250.eng_source: And until I say different nobody's gonna plan for this mob but me.
250.sl_trans: In dokler ne rečem drugače, nihče ne bo načrtoval za to množico, razen mene.

256.sl_source: Rekel sem ti, da pridi ob 20.30.
256.eng_source: I told you to be here at 8:30.
256.sl_trans: Rekel sem ti, da moraš biti tukaj ob 8:30.

259.eng_source: - Oh, you know how it is.

260.eng_source: - Yeah, I know how it is.

261.sl_source: So mi rekli, a jim nisem verjel.
261.eng_source: They've been saying it, only I didn't believe them.
261.sl_trans: To so govorili, le da jim nisem verjel.

262.sl_source: Rekli so, da se ti tresejo hlače.
262.eng_source: They're crazy when they call you yellow.
262.sl_trans: Ko vas označijo za rumene, so nori.

263.sl_source: Kaj pa je sploh tako nujnega?
263.eng_source: Say, what's the big idea of the rush anyway?
263.sl_trans: Kaj je sploh glavna ideja te naglice?

264.sl_source: Rabimo te za en manjši posel.
264.eng_source: It's a little job we need you for.

265.eng_source: A little job at the Bronze Peacock.

267.eng_source: Are you trying to kid me or something?
267.sl_trans: Ali se mi želite izmuzniti ali kaj podobnega?

268.eng_source: How can I take the chance?

269.eng_source: They're all my friends, they all know me.
269.sl_trans: Vsi so moji prijatelji, vsi me poznajo.

270.sl_source: Ravno zato, ne bodo te sumili.
270.eng_source: That's why, they'll never suspect you.
270.sl_trans: Zato vas nikoli ne bodo osumili.

273.eng_source: You gotta get me out of this.

275.sl_source: Kaj ne razumeš, da imam zdaj redno delo.
275.eng_source: Well, don't you see, I'm working steady now.
275.sl_trans: No, ne vidite, zdaj delam stalno.

276.sl_source: Ne morem reči, da sem končal?
276.eng_source: Can't a guy ever say he's through?
276.sl_trans: Ali fant nikoli ne more reči, da je končal?

277.sl_source: Sodeloval boš pri tem in še všeč ti bo.
277.eng_source: You're gonna be in on this, and you'll like it.
277.sl_trans: Pri tem boste sodelovali in všeč vam bo.

278.sl_source: Udarili bomo na silvestrovo točno opolnoči.
278.eng_source: The time is to be sharp midnight on New Year's Eve.
278.sl_trans: Ura bo na silvestrovo točno opolnoči.

280.eng_source: - I'll be working New Year's Eve.

282.eng_source: This is the joint where you're working.
282.sl_trans: To je prostor, v katerem delate.

283.eng_source: And don't you be forgetting it, either.
283.sl_trans: In tudi vi tega ne pozabite.

285.sl_source: Morda ni tako lahko opehariti Arnieja.
285.eng_source: Maybe we can't buck Little Arnie.
285.sl_trans: Morda ne moremo odgnati malega Arnieja.

287.eng_source: Ah, you're too good, that's what.
287.sl_trans: Ah, preveč ste dobri, to je to.

288.sl_source: Se ti je zelo mudilo sem, ne?
288.eng_source: You were in a big hurry about getting here, weren't you?
288.sl_trans: Zelo se vam je mudilo, ko ste prišli sem, kajne?

289.sl_source: Morda ti ni všeč tako delo.
289.eng_source: - Maybe this kind of work ain't to your liking.
289.sl_trans: - Morda vam ta vrsta dela ni všeč.

290.sl_trans: - Z Joejem je vse v redu.

294.sl_source: Jaz sem si takole zamislil zadevo.
294.eng_source: Here's the way I dope this thing out.
294.sl_trans: To je način, kako to zadevo pripravim.

298.sl_source: Na to si pa pozabil, kaj?
298.eng_source: You kind of forgot that, didn't you?
298.sl_trans: Na to ste kar pozabili, kajne?

299.eng_source: Hey, I'm boss on this job, not you.
299.sl_trans: Pri tem delu sem jaz šef, ne ti.

303.eng_source: I tell you, I'm afraid, Otero.

309.sl_source: Ti boš stal v veži in nam dal znak, če bo vse v redu.
309.eng_source: You'll be in the lobby and give us the high sign if everything's on the up and up.
309.sl_trans: Bili boste v avli in nam dali visok znak, če je vse v najlepšem redu.

311.sl_source: ln če se kaj zalomi, boš tvegal skupaj z vsemi nami.
311.eng_source: Yeah, and if we get in a jam, you'll have to take a chance with the rest of us.
311.sl_trans: Ja, in če se bomo znašli v težavah, boš moral tvegati z nami.

313.sl_trans: Sveti Mojzes, to je Alvin McClure.

315.sl_source: Pripelji McClura sem, da mu plačam limonado.
315.eng_source: Bring McClure over here, I want to buy him a lemonade.
315.sl_trans: Pripeljite McClura sem, rad bi mu kupil limonado.

322.eng_source: Delighted to have you with us, folks.
322.sl_trans: Veseli me, da ste z nami.

323.sl_source: Naš donator bi vas rad spoznal.
323.eng_source: A financial backer of mine would like to meet you.
323.sl_trans: Moj finančni podpornik bi vas rad spoznal.

324.eng_source: - May I bring him over to your table?
324.sl_trans: - Ali ga lahko pripeljem k vaši mizi?

325.sl_source: Tisti, ki mu pravijo Little Arnie?
325.eng_source: - You mean the man they call Little Arnie?
325.sl_trans: - Misliš tistega, ki mu pravijo Mali Arnie?

326.eng_source: - You say he's a financial backer of yours?
326.sl_trans: - Pravite, da je vaš finančni podpornik?

327.sl_source: -Nisem vedel, da so taki povezani s tem lokalom.
327.eng_source: I didn't understand that a man of his type was connected with this place.
327.sl_trans: Nisem razumel, da je človek njegovega tipa povezan s tem krajem.

328.eng_source: I came to this place under a misapprehension.
328.sl_trans: Na to mesto sem prišel z napačno predstavo.

329.sl_source: -Žal mi je, toda iti moramo drugam.
329.eng_source: - I'm sorry, folks but we'll have to go somewhere else.
329.sl_trans: - Žal mi je, ljudje, ampak bomo morali iti drugam.

330.sl_source: Ti je všeč taka pričeska, Joey?
330.eng_source: You like my hair this way, Joey?
330.sl_trans: So ti moji lasje všeč takšni, Joey?

331.eng_source: - Just to get a package of cigarettes.

332.sl_trans: - Pohiti nazaj, dragi, saj je že skoraj 12:00.

333.sl_source: ln v novo leto bi rada vstopila s tabo.
333.eng_source: And I wanna be with you for New Year's.
333.sl_trans: In želim biti s teboj za novo leto.

334.eng_source: I'll be back in a minute.

339.eng_source: Open her up, Tony, this ain't no picnic.
339.sl_trans: Odprite jo, Tony, to ni piknik.

341.sl_source: Ti je srce padlo v hlače?

342.eng_source: Let's go, we gotta get out of here.
342.sl_trans: Pojdimo, moramo se umakniti od tu.

348.eng_source: - The joint's been held up, that's all.
348.sl_trans: - Vse, kar se je zgodilo, je, da je bil sklep zadržan.

355.eng_source: It wasn't me that shot him.

357.sl_source: Vendar se nam bo to maščevalo.
357.eng_source: But it's our hips for this job, all right.
357.sl_trans: Ampak za to službo so to naši boki, prav.

358.sl_source: Morda bo pa še vse v redu.
358.eng_source: Maybe - Maybe everything will be all right, Joey.
358.sl_trans: Morda - Morda bo vse v redu, Joey.

360.eng_source: But you're through with that bunch.
360.sl_trans: Toda s to skupino ste končali.

363.sl_source: Ne boš se jim več približal.
363.eng_source: You'll never go near them again.
363.sl_trans: Nikoli več se jim ne boste približali.

364.eng_source: You can't go back on a gang.

365.sl_source: No, se je vse dobro izteklo?
365.eng_source: Well, everything come off all right?

368.eng_source: Only I had to take care of a guy.
368.sl_trans: Samo jaz sem morala poskrbeti za fanta.

370.sl_source: Milijon ljudi je v tem mestu, ti pa si ustrelil ravno komisarja za kriminal.
370.eng_source: A million guys in this town, and you had to pick the crime commissioner.
370.sl_trans: V tem mestu je milijon fantov, ti pa si moral izbrati kriminalističnega komisarja.

371.eng_source: What did I tell you, Rico?

372.eng_source: Didn't I say to make it clean?
372.sl_trans: Ali nisem rekel, da naj bo čista?

373.sl_trans: Ali nisem rekel, da ne smete igrati z orožjem?

374.sl_source: Naj tipu pustim, da strelja name?
374.eng_source: Think I'm going to let a guy pull a gat on me?
374.sl_trans: Misliš, da bom dovolil, da me fant prevaruje?

375.sl_source: Še ena taka, pa bo to moj zadnji posel!
375.eng_source: Any more of these cracks, and this is my last job.
375.sl_trans: Če bo še kakšna od teh razpok, je to moja zadnja zaposlitev.

376.eng_source: The head of the crime commission.

377.sl_source: Tokrat nam Big Boy ne bo v pomoč.
377.eng_source: The Big Boy can't do us no good this trip.
377.sl_trans: Big Boy nam na tem potovanju ne more pomagati.

378.eng_source: They'll get us dead sure now.

380.eng_source: - Why don't you go and give yourself up?
380.sl_trans: - Zakaj se ne bi šli predati?

382.sl_trans: In Tony, kaj je z njim?

387.eng_source: What a fine pickle we're in.
387.sl_trans: V kakšnem precepu smo se znašli.

388.eng_source: You and that rod of yours.

389.sl_source: Spodaj je Flaherty z dvema špicljema.
389.eng_source: Flaherty's downstairs, a couple of dicks with him.
389.sl_trans: Flaherty je spodaj, z njim pa je še nekaj kurcev.

391.eng_source: Stay where you are, all of you.

392.sl_source: Nič ne vejo, če niso prijeli Tonyja.
392.eng_source: They won't know nothing unless they picked Tony up.
392.sl_trans: Ničesar ne bodo vedeli, če ne bodo pobrali Tonyja.

395.sl_source: Na ulici smo našli zapuščen avto.
395.eng_source: Say, there's a lonesome touring car down the street.
395.sl_trans: Recimo, po ulici vozi osamljen potovalni avtomobil.

396.sl_source: Zanima me, če mogoče kaj veš o tem.
396.eng_source: I was wondering if you happened to know anything about it.
396.sl_trans: Zanima me, ali o tem kaj veste.

397.eng_source: How should I know anything about it?
397.sl_trans: Kako naj o tem kaj vem?

398.eng_source: - Ain't it got license plates on it?

400.eng_source: It was stolen on the north side tonight.
400.sl_trans: Nocoj so ga ukradli na severni strani.

401.eng_source: Oh, I got a good café business.

402.sl_source: Nič ne vem o ukradenih avtomobilih.
402.eng_source: I don't know nothing about automobiles what's been stolen.
402.sl_trans: O ukradenih avtomobilih ne vem ničesar.

403.sl_source: Lahko bi, če bi kateri od teh mladeničev imel kaj pri tem, kajne?
403.eng_source: Well, you might if some of the bright young men around here had anything to do with it, wouldn't you?
403.sl_trans: No, lahko bi, če bi imeli nekateri bistri mladeniči tukaj kaj opraviti z njo, kajne?

404.sl_trans: - Ali v njem ni bilo nikogar?

407.eng_source: But we got a good description of him, though.

408.sl_source: Saj pravim, nič ne vem o tem.
408.eng_source: I'm telling you, I don't know nothing about it.
408.sl_trans: Pravim vam, da o tem ne vem ničesar.
